title: The Tragic Leash Cliffhanger
description: The doors start to close as a kid rushes in. His tiny dog, Sir Wigglebottom, is still outside. The leash is caught between the doors, pulled taut like a cartoon physics experiment.

options.text: Hit the door open button and gently pull the leash to bring Sir Wigglebottom in.
options.consequence_text: You save the pup, the kid beams, and everyone silently agrees you are now elevator captain.

options.text: Shout 'Abort mission!' and grab the leash, but accidentally pull yourself halfway out.
options.consequence_text: The dog is fine, you're slightly bruised, and the elevator now respects your chaotic energy.

options.text: Do nothing. This is a physics problem for future adults.
options.consequence_text: The doors reopen automatically, the dog trots in unharmed, and the guilt hovers like elevator music.

title: Just Ben (Totally Original)
description: The doors open and a man who looks suspiciously like a certain movie star steps in, humming 'I am just Ben, anywhere else I'd be a ten.'

options.text: Casually nod and say, 'Big fan of your… legally distinct work.'
options.consequence_text: He winks and says, 'Thanks, I’m just Ben.' The entire elevator levels up in coolness.

options.text: Start humming along, perfectly in sync, full eye contact.
options.consequence_text: Everyone else stares at the floor. Ben looks impressed and slightly afraid.

options.text: Press 'Door Open' and loudly announce, 'This elevator is for mortals only.'
options.consequence_text: He laughs, steps out dramatically, and the doors close on your power trip.

title: The Great Coffee Quake
description: A person walks in balancing a tray with four coffees. The elevator lurches slightly. Time slows. Destiny smells like espresso.

options.text: Grab the tray like an action hero and stabilize it.
options.consequence_text: Not a single drop is spilled. You are briefly worshipped as a caffeine deity.

options.text: Offer your empty tote bag as an emergency spill zone.
options.consequence_text: Your bag is now a mocha swamp, but the floor survives. Karma +10, bag -100.

options.text: Press a random floor and step out before the physics happens.
options.consequence_text: You escape the coffee tsunami, but you will always know what you did not do.

title: The Elevator Theremin
description: As the doors open, the muzak morphs into eerie sci‑fi sounds. A stranger waves their hands, insisting the elevator is actually a giant theremin.

options.text: Join in and 'play' a duet, matching their movements.
options.consequence_text: You both create haunting elevator music. Everyone else rethinks their life choices.

options.text: Politely ask them to stop and suggest headphones.
options.consequence_text: They apologize and switch to humming softly. The tension resolves like a jazz chord.

options.text: Pretend to be an elevator inspector and take notes on their 'performance'.
options.consequence_text: They play even harder, convinced this is an audition. You’ve made a monster.

title: Accidental Group Therapy
description: A coworker enters, sighs deeply, and says, 'Since we’re all here, I need to vent about the meeting.' Doors close. No escape.

options.text: Act as therapist, nodding and asking gentle follow‑up questions.
options.consequence_text: They feel better. You acquire unofficial emotional support responsibilities.

options.text: Start a 'talking stick' with the 'door open' button.
options.consequence_text: Everyone shares. The elevator becomes a tiny, mildly effective support group.

options.text: Pretend you just remembered another floor and bail.
options.consequence_text: You avoid drama, but the coworker’s sigh echoes in your soul.

title: Schröding‑ish Cat
description: A traveler rushes in with a suitcase. A faint 'mrrp' sound comes from inside. They freeze. Everyone heard it.

options.text: Gently ask if they also heard the 'mrrp' and offer help.
options.consequence_text: It’s their cat, accidentally zipped in. You help rescue it. The cat immediately ignores you.

options.text: Start meowing back in different tones to triangulate the cat.
options.consequence_text: The cat meows, you meow, everyone accepts this now.

options.text: Stare straight ahead, pretending nothing is wrong with reality.
options.consequence_text: The doors open; they rush off. The mystery cat lives only in your memory.

title: Ghost of Fire Drills Past
description: The elevator stops at an empty floor. A faint alarm plays the wrong tune, like a fire drill remixed by a DJ.

options.text: Suggest everyone exit and take the stairs, just in case.
options.consequence_text: You all take the stairs. It was a false alarm, but your calves level up.

options.text: Joke that the building is just testing your cardio anxiety.
options.consequence_text: Tension breaks, people laugh, the elevator seems to approve.

options.text: Declare this floor cursed and mash the 'close doors' button.
options.consequence_text: The doors close. If there were ghosts, they are now mildly offended.
